skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: visit las vegas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Talk to Vegas allows you to find out what’s happening in Las Vegas, directly from the source. Whether you’re a Vegas regular or first-timer, you’ll discover up-to-date, insider information on who’s performing, what to eat, where to go and more. With enough options to plan an unforgettable trip, Talk to Vegas makes it easy to learn interesting facts about the city, discover hidden gems to impress your friends, and stay connected with your favorite destination throughout the year.


HOW DOES IT WORK?
All you need to do is say, “Alexa, open Las Vegas.”

Now you’re ready to learn more about Las Vegas. Here are 10 questions you can ask:

• What’s going on in Las Vegas?
• What’s the most Insta-worthy spot in Las Vegas?
• When’s the best time to visit Las Vegas?
• What’s new in Las Vegas?
• Who is performing in Las Vegas? 
• What are the new restaurants in Las Vegas?
• What are some hidden gems in Las Vegas?
• What are some unique things to do on the Strip?
• What is there to do in Downtown Las Vegas?
• Tell me something cool about Las Vegas.


Follow Las Vegas on Facebook and Instagram to learn more about what’s new and happening around town and, of course, to share your favorite Vegas photos, memories and stories by using #Vegas.
priv:
